rusty_key.name: Rusty Key
rusty_key.description: An old, rusty iron key. It looks like it might fit an old lock. The metal is cold to the touch and covered in a patina of age.

candle.name: Candle
candle.description: A half-melted white candle with a wick that looks like it could still be lit. It might provide some light in dark places.

ancient_amulet.name: Ancient Amulet
ancient_amulet.description: A mysterious amulet with strange symbols etched into tarnished silver. It feels warm and pulses with an otherworldly energy.

locked_door.name: Locked Door
locked_door.description: A heavy wooden door with iron reinforcements. The lock looks old but sturdy. This appears to be the exit from the mansion.
locked_door.interaction_message: The door is locked tight. You need a key to open it.
locked_door.success_message: You insert the rusty key into the lock. With a satisfying click, the door unlocks!

bookshelf.name: Bookshelf
bookshelf.description: This bookshelf on the left seems a bit different, almost like it could be moved by ancient magic. Upon closer inspection, you notice strange symbols carved into the wood that match those on the amulet.
bookshelf.interaction_message: You examine the bookshelf closely, searching for any hidden mechanisms.
bookshelf.success_message: You channel the amulet's power toward the bookshelf. The symbols glow with ethereal light, and with a grinding sound, the bookshelf slides aside, revealing a dark stairway leading down to a basement!
